definition: turtle/Internet slang for 海歸|海归[hai3 gui1]
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Despite living in freshwater, it is also resembles marine turtles.
sentences.chinese: 尽管猪鼻龟生活在淡水中，它同时又很像海龟。

sentences.english: In another game, as the turtle swims across the oceanarium.
sentences.chinese: 在另一场游戏中，当海龟游过水族馆时。

sentences.english: The turtle, like all reptiles, is cold-blooded.
sentences.chinese: 海龟和所有爬行动物一样，是冷血动物。

sentences.english: They plopped each turtle into a small pool surrounded by magnetic coils.
sentences.chinese: 他们把每个海龟放进有磁线圈围绕的小池子里。

sentences.english: A Hawaiian green sea turtle swims in just a few feet of water.
sentences.chinese: 一只夏威夷绿海龟在几英尺水下游泳。

sentences.english: More than 500 sea turtles died in the spill area.
sentences.chinese: 据统计，在泄露海域有超过500只海龟死亡。

sentences.english: Except for the nightmarish old-man turtle, of course. [via PitchForkMedia]
sentences.chinese: 当然除了那只老头海龟。

sentences.english: Today, Parker continues on as hands-down the most successful Turtle.
sentences.chinese: 如今，帕克还是在轻松地做着最成功的海龟。

sentences.english: Hu Ping thinks that the sea turtle is a quite friendly animal.
sentences.chinese: 在胡萍的眼里，海龟是一种相当友善的动物。

sentences.english: A man came and slammed the turtle out fall.
sentences.chinese: 一个汉子走过来，用力把海龟翻个四脚朝天。

sentences.english: Keefer saw other Turtles who could have had Parker's level of success.
sentences.chinese: 科夫的意思是说其他海龟也可以取得帕克的成功。

sentences.english: The Turtles were going to use O'Brien as a broker to set up a Turtle fund.
sentences.chinese: 海龟们把欧博仁当作经纪公司，以成立一个海龟基金。

sentences.english: The Turtles were going to use O'Brien as a broker to set up a Turtle fund.
sentences.chinese: 海龟们把欧博仁当作经纪公司，以成立一个海龟基金。

sentences.english: In fact, Turtles could have had a string of losers in a row with multiple false breakouts .
sentences.chinese: 实际上，海龟们会因为假突破而形成一连串的亏损。

sentences.english: One day four coolies came with a huge sea turtle for sale.
sentences.chinese: 一天，四个苦力抬来一只巨大的海龟出售。

sentences.english: “We had eggs in our hands, ” Matilda said.
sentences.chinese: “我们手里拿着海龟蛋，”马蒂尔德说。
